Package org.apache.wayang.core.api

Class Job

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.util.OneTimeExecutable
      • org.apache.wayang.core.api.Job
  • public class Job
extends OneTimeExecutable
    Describes a job that is to be executed using Wayang.
